# Unliving Rage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One willing undead creature per 3 levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** Concentration + 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 198

This spell functions as *[[Rage (Spell)|rage]]*, except it affects only undead creatures and bolsters them with necromantic energy rather than emotion. Each affected creature gains a +2 profane bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +1 profane bonus on Will saves, and a –2 penalty to AC. The effect is otherwise identical to a barbarian’s rage.
